data.comment: The match is underway in Hamilton.
Don Robertson signals a Celtic throw-in in Hamilton's half.
In the minute 3, Leigh Griffiths for Celtic drives towards goal at Hope CBD Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hamilton.
In the minute 5, Nir Bitton is booked for the away team.
Hamilton drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Celtic have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Hamilton.
Celtic drive upfield and Ryan Christie gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hamilton defender.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
In the minute 9, Nir Bitton (Celtic) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Hamilton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hamilton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Hamilton in Hamilton.
Don Robertson awards the away team a throw-in.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
In the minute 12, In Hamilton, Nir Bitton (Celtic) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Hamilton goal kick.
Don Robertson waits before resuming play because David Moyo for Hamilton is still down.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Hamilton in the half of Celtic.
David Moyo is back on his feet again.
Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
In the minute 16, Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Goal kick for Hamilton at Hope CBD Stadium.
In the minute 19, Leigh Griffiths (Celtic) gets in a header â€“ but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
Celtic push forward at Hope CBD Stadium and David Turnbull gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hamilton defence.
Celtic pushes forward through Leigh Griffiths, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 21, Celtic have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
In Hamilton, Greg Taylor of Celtic is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
In the minute 22, Hamilton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Hamilton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Hamilton have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
Throw-in for Celtic at Hope CBD Stadium.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Celtic just outside Hamilton's area.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Hamilton.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hamilton.
Can Celtic capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 31, Scott McMann (Hamilton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Don Robertson awards Hamilton a goal kick.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 35, In Hamilton Celtic attack through Odsonne Edouard. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hamilton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, Don Robertson signals a throw-in for Hamilton, close to Celtic's area.
Throw-in Celtic.
Hamilton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Hamilton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 38, Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
Ball safe as Hamilton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
In the minute 40, Don Robertson signals a Celtic throw-in in Hamilton's half.
In Hamilton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Hope CBD Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Celtic's Leigh Griffiths gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hamilton defender.
David Turnbull of Celtic smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Andy Winter of Hamilton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Celtic at Hope CBD Stadium.
Important block from the Hamilton defence as Odsonne Edouard fires in a strike for Celtic.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Celtic.
Odsonne Edouard gets his shot on target but fails to score for Celtic.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Hope CBD Stadium.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Celtic.
In the minute 50, Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Celtic take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Odsonne Edouard spot-kick..
Celtic's David Turnbull breaks free at Hope CBD Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Hamilton goal kick.
In the minute 51, Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
Celtic's Ryan Christie gets in a shot on goal at Hope CBD Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
In the minute 54, Leigh Griffiths puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Odsonne Edouard instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Hamilton in the half of Celtic.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Hamilton.
Don Robertson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Hamilton in their own half.
Throw-in for Celtic at Hope CBD Stadium.
Throw-in Celtic.
In the minute 63, Hamilton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Hamilton in their own half.
Can Hamilton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celtic's half?
In the minute 65, Don Robertson awards Hamilton a goal kick.
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Don Robertson signals a free kick to Hamilton in their own half.
In the minute 68, Can Hamilton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celtic's half?
Hamilton's Charlie Trafford gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Celtic defender.
Celtic have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Tunde Owolabi is replacing Andy Winter for the home team.
Free kick Celtic.
Celtic are coming forward and Nir Bitton gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, Hamilton have a goal kick.
Neil Lennon is making the team's first substitution at Hope CBD Stadium with Albian Ajeti replacing Leigh Griffiths.
Throw-in for Celtic at Hope CBD Stadium.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Goal! Celtic extend their lead to 0-3 through David Turnbull.
Odsonne Edouard heads the ball against the upright! Almost a goal there for Celtic.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Hamilton at Hope CBD Stadium.
The away team have replaced Odsonne Edouard with Patryk Klimala. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Lennon.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mikey Johnston is replacing David Turnbull for Celtic at Hope CBD Stadium.
Free kick for Hamilton in their own half.
Don Robertson signals a Hamilton throw-in in Celtic's half.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Celtic needs to be cautious. Hamilton have an attacking throw-in.
Can Hamilton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celtic's half?
Don Robertson signals a throw-in for Hamilton, close to Celtic's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Celtic goal kick.
In the minute 82, Reegan Mimnaugh is on a sub for Ben Stirling for Hamilton.
Throw-in Hamilton.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Ryan Christie with Mohamed Elyounoussi.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Hamilton territory.
In the minute 85, In Hamilton, David Moyo of Hamilton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Don Robertson awards the home team a throw-in.
Celtic's Jeremie Frimpong misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 87, Don Robertson awards Hamilton a goal kick.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Celtic push forward at Hope CBD Stadium and Mohamed Elyounoussi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hamilton defence.
In the minute 89, Celtic have been awarded a corner by Don Robertson.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Don Robertson will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Hamilton needs to be cautious. Celtic have an attacking throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
Brian Rice (Hamilton) is making a third substitution, with Kyle Munro replacing David Moyo.
